      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(java.lang.CharSequence charSequence)
        Checks if the given character sequence is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        charSequence - Character sequence being checked for nullness or emptiness.
        Returns:
        true if the character sequence is null or empty, false otherwise.

      • replace

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.CharSequence replace(java.lang.CharSequence charSequence,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.CharSequence> pairs)
        Replaces the characters (keys) in a given map with a corresponding character sequence (values).
        Parameters:
        charSequence - Character sequence to replace characters in.
        pairs - Map containing which characters to look for and their replacements.
        Returns:
        Character sequence where all keys in the given map have been replaced by their corresponding values.

      • toTitleCase

        public static java.lang.CharSequence toTitleCase(java.lang.CharSequence charSequence)
        Converts the first letter of each word in the provided character sequence to uppercase.
        Parameters:
        charSequence - Character sequence to convert.
        Returns:
        String where the first letter of each word has been converted to uppercase

        Creates a copy of the source byte array.
        Parameters:
        source - Array to make copy of.
        Returns:
        A copy of the array, or null if source was null.
